fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports

Interface TwoWayPortI<TWI extends TwoWayI>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentServiceI, InboundPortI, OfferedI, OutboundPortI, PortI, java.rmi.Remote, RequiredI, TwoWayI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataTwoWayPort, AbstractDataTwoWayPortForPlugin, AbstractTwoWayPort, AbstractTwoWayPortForPlugin, PingPongDataTwoWayPort, PingPongTwoWayPort

    public interface TwoWayPortI<TWI extends TwoWayI>
extends InboundPortI, OutboundPortI, TwoWayI
    The interface TwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming and outgoing calls among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.

    Description

    Created on : 2012-01-23

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AbstractTwoWayConnector<TWI> getConnector()
      returns the connector to which this port is attached, and null if none.
      TwoWayI getOut()
      returns the proxy to be used by the owner component when calling components connected to this port.
